live_updates: Issues in the area have been resolved and found as a result of a power outage in the area.  We thank you for your patience.
We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
35049.summary: Some customers in Northwest Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35049.title: Mar 17 – Northwest Calgary| All Services - Outage (Resolved)
